title: Finitely supported functions over the nonnegative integers

blocks.name: fsuppmapnn0fiub
blocks.content: If all functions of a finite set of functions over the nonnegative integers are finitely supported, then the support of all these functions is contained in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0 and ending with the supremum of the union of the support of these functions. (Contributed by AV, 2-Oct-2019.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 2-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppmapnn0fiub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wss(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wa(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c2)), wne(c4, emptycls)), wral(s0, c0, wss(co(cv(s0), csupp, c2), co(nat0, cfz, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c4, ciun(s0, c0, co(cv(s0), csupp, c2)))
  -| wceq(c5, csup(c4, cr, clt))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.name: fsuppmapnn0fiubex
blocks.content: If all functions of a finite set of functions over the nonnegative integers are finitely supported, then the support of all these functions is contained in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0. (Contributed by AV, 2-Oct-2019.)

blocks.name: fsuppmapnn0fiub0

blocks.name: suppssfz
blocks.content: Condition for a function over the nonnegative integers to have a support contained in a finite set of sequential integers. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)

  eqneqall(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, c2)))

  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfz, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1)))))

blocks.name: fsuppmapnn0ub
blocks.content: If a function over the nonnegative integers is finitely supported, then there is an upper bound for the arguments resulting in nonzero values. (Contributed by AV, 6-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppmapnn0ub(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)))), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))
  fsuppimpd(c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2))
  syl6bi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)))), wcel(crab(s1, cn0, wne(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)), cfn))
  eleq1d(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn, crab(s1, cn0, wne(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, cn0)), wcel(c2, c3)))

thm mptnn0fsuppd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn0, c0), cfsupp, c1))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mptnn0fsupp(s0, s2, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wrex(s2, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1)))), wrex(s2, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(c4, c1)))))
  reximi(s2, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(c4, c1))), wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1))))
  ralimi(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(c4, c1)), wi(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1)))
  imim2i(wbr(cv(s2), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(c4, c1), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1))
  syl5eq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1, c4, wceq(c4, c1))
  csbie(s0, cv(s1), c0, c4)

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mptnn0fsupp(s0, s2, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0,(s2[<]s1 →[s1 / s0]c0 = c1))), ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0,(s2[<]s1 → c4 = c1))))
  reximi(s2, cn0, ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0,(s2[<]s1 → c4 = c1)), ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0,(s2[<]s1 →[s1 / s0]c0 = c1)))

  vex(s1)
  id(c4 = c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
